title: Andy Littleton, Outpost Part Time Church Planting in a Divided Culture
description:
Andy is a friend of Rod Hugen, who's a friend of mine and has been on the channel. He is a church planter in Tucson AZ. He's written a book on bi-vocational pastoring. Here's out talk.
